After finding it online after all this time I watched all the episodes and finally went to sleep. Before I went fully to sleep I wished that I could live in Acme Acres and peacefully shut my eyes. Hours later I was woken up by the sun shining in my face but when I fully woke up I saw I was in a meadow that looked like I've seen it before. After a little thinking I realised I was in the world of tiny toons I was in Acme Acres. Since I've seen the show so much I knew where most things where so I decided to go to Acme Looniversity I could probably convenience them that I'm a new student.

122.content:
As I traveled along the dirt road to Acme Looniversity, I heard a loud gasp.

"Do not fear my dear, Fifi La Fume is here!" Fifi La Fume's voice cried out as the sound of a train was heard.

"Heh. Guess she's found another 'skunk' to chase after," You muttered to yourself with a chuckle.

When the sound of the Fifi train was coming closer, you looked in a puddle and noticed that your hair now had a skunk stripe. You put a strain between two fingers and discovered that it was not paint. Either your hair was dyed or was now naturally like that.

"Oh shi-" You uttered before Fifi tackled you into a rolling ball.

After several moments of rolling along, the two of you hit a tree and stopped. You were lying on your back and she laid on top of you.

"Hello, I am Fifi La Fume! Will you be my... boyfriend?" Fifi said before she grabbed the sides of your head and gave you a big kiss. After nearly causing you to pass out, she stopped the kiss and asked, "Ah! I am so impolite! What is your name, loverboy?"

"Uh... My name is (NAME)..." You nervously answered. "And I am not a skunk. I'm a human."

"Absurdité! Your hair tells a different story!" Fifi exclaimed as she sat up, even grabbing the collar of your shirt and making you sit up as well. As she gave you another kiss, she wrapped her tail around you.

Just as the smell began to rise up from her tail, you managed to break free and run off.

"Oh, how I love it when they play rough like that!" Fifi cooed as she stood up and hopped after you.

===

As you ran, you thought about Fifi.

On one hand, she was cute and a great kisser.

On the other hand, you didn't want to be near the skunk spray smell.

It didn't take long before you ran into someone.
122.title: Fifi La Fume

choices: Fifi shows up and is furious at Bimbette
Fifi shows up and is furious at you!
Fifi shows up and... says she goes first with you!
1221.content:
You were very busy trying to dodge a purple skunk that kept popping out of various places, like a doorway, a street drainage vent, a trash can, and any other spot that clearly couldn't hide her.

So busy, you didn't see the pink furry in front of you. You and her tumbled around a bit, somehow winding up rolling into an alley, when a few moments afterwords, Fifi ran by, looking for you.

When the two of you came to a stop, you saw who you were on top of.

She was a pink skunk with long white hair on top of her head. She wore a dark green leotard.

You were on top of Bimbette ▼
http://tinytoons.wikia.com/wiki/Bimbette...
.

"S-sorry, miss! I was trying to run away from Fifi La Fume. She saw the stripe in my hair and-" you began, pausing when you felt arms and legs wrap around you, pinning your arms to your side.

"And she decided you're boyfriend material, right?" Bimbette asked.

"Y-yes?" you nervously answered, getting a feeling that you should escape now.

"Oh ho ho ho! That's Fifi for you!" Bimbette chuckled as her tail covered your back like a blanket.

"So... you'll help me and let me go?" you asked with a nervous smile.

"I will help you," Bimbette cooed. "..by making you my boyfriend. After all, I took Johnny Pew's autograph from her. I might as well take her would-be boyfriend."

"That's not letting me go," You replied.

"No, it is not," Bimbette said before she kissed you right on the lips.

You looked back up and saw the visible green skunk smell begin to lower from her tail.

You struggled and let out loud noises, unable to do much more.

===

Outside the alley, Fif heard some muffled noises and headed to a nearby alley.

===

Right before the green scent cloud could touch you, you ahdn Bimbette heard, "Sacre Bleu!"

The room around you was clearly underground. There were a few dressers, a closet, shelves, a few stands and a desk. On the shelves and stands were plushies, jewelry boxes, and pictures. Oddly, there either weren't any of Buster. The closet was half-opened and revealed a number of the costumes Babs wore at one time or another. There were two doors. One was opened enough to show that it lead into the living room.

The other room was closed, but there was the sound of a shower running and Babs humming the Tiny Toons theme song.

You also noticed that you had a lack of clothes. At most, a tanktop and briefs, but you weren't sure you had put them on this morning.

You tried to move, but you found your limbs hard to move. So you looked at your arms to figure out why.

in walked an adult anthro Rabbit ▼

Her fur was yellow, though she had orange-ish blonde hair on her head. She wore a green sweater and a dark green skirt.

"Hello, Class. I'm Honey Bunny. I will be teaching basic gags and skits. As some gags and skits do require disguises, I will delve into those a little bit," The Rabbit said with a cheerful tone. Then she glowered before adding, "And no, I am not Lola Bunny."

After taking a deep breath, Honey Bunny asked, "So... let's start off with a basic one. Let's see... Oh! You there! Mr... (NAME)! Come up in front of the class."

With some hesitancy, you walked up.

"Now... This gag is a rather plain one that's kind of falling out of vogue for various reasons. You try to flirt with me and I hit you with a hammer," Honey Bunny said. Seeing your worry, she said, "Don't worry we're Toons and will recover from it. At worse, you'll be a walking plate for a few minutes until someone pulls you out of it."

You nodded. Remembering one certain cartoon, you said, "Hey, baby. You free tonight to watch me flex?"

Honey Bunny's response was to flatten you with an oversized hammer. She turned towards the class and explained, "One of the possible reasons this has fallen out of vogue is the Tsundere character in Japan. An overabundance in media of the character trait does stir up quite a bit of hate in the western countries."

She then looked down at you and asked, "Do you need any help?"

You put your thumb in your mouth and blew until you inflated back to your normal shape. After taking your thumb out of your mouth, you said, "I'm fine."

1352.content:
Downtown seemed... weird.

Look one moment and it's a nice quiet town area, merely a few blocks away from farmland.

Look away for a moment and suddenly you're deep within an urban jungle, barely able to see the skies.

You sigh, remembering that the show tended to move around where Acme Acres was in the united states.

Sometimes, there was a crowd that prevented you from moving much. Sometimes there barely was anyone around. Such is the problems of animation on a cartoon show.

Eventually, you came across something that caught your eye.

There was a restaurant, where you saw a number of Toons inside and eating food. You has a suspicion that Furball lived in an alley nearby, though the fact he was inside the restaurant and eating made you wonder.

Besides it was a store that had had signs proclaiming it had toys and books for sale. You felt nostalgic, as such places were rare in in your native time and place. You wondered if you'd enter in a 'things come to life in a store' cartoon,, like in 'Book Revue'. Going by what you saw, Mary Melody and Shirley were frequenting inside.
